## Installing Docker

Installing Docker depends on ypur Linux distribution. See [https://docs.docker.com/desktop/install/linux-install/](https://docs.docker.com/desktop/install/linux-install/) for more details.

- For `Ubuntu` you can install the necessary packages by running the following:

```bash
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade
sudo apt install -y wget
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeksterslab/dynr-wiki/main/src/build-docker.sh | bash
```

## Running the dynr Docker Container

-   Type the following to launch `Rstudio Server`[^docker-linux-1] on the terminal:

[^docker-linux-1]: Replace `jeksterslab/dynr-rocker` with `jeksterslab/dynr-arma-rocker` to use the `arma` branch.

```bash
sudo docker run --rm -ti -e PASSWORD=yourpassword -p 8787:8787 jeksterslab/dynr-rocker
```

-   Open http://localhost:8787 on your web browser to launch `Rstudio Server`.
    -   username: rstudio
    -   password: yourpassword
